## logWithLevel() function

Switch helper to invoke log methods based on variable log level. Dispatches a call to the appropriate log level method.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function logWithLevel(logger: Logger, level: LogLevel, options: Error | LogParams, msg: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  logger | [Logger](./noicejs.logger.md) |  |
|  level | [LogLevel](./noicejs.loglevel.md) |  |
|  options | Error \| LogParams |  |
|  msg | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
